channel.title: DNS exfiltration on SpawnZii

item.title: [Avent ESNA] Web - Papa noël gère ses documents Introduction
item.description: Introduction Every year ESNA organizes a CTF as an advent calendar, so there is a new challenge every day on a different theme, like pwn, forensic, programming, reverse and web. To motivate students to participate, the TOP 8 of the general ranking will be selected to participate in the CTF of EC2. The challenges are proposed by Worty & iHuggsy, but also by other trusted students ;). I will try to explain you how I solved the web challenge.
